definition: Fenggang county in Zunyi 遵義|遵义[Zun1 yi4], Guizhou
Fenggang county in Zunyi 遵義|遵义[Zun1 yi4], Guizhou

sentences.english: In brief, my hometown is a place which is worthy of being visited.
sentences.chinese: 總而言之，我的家鄉鳳岡是一個值得旅遊的地方。

sentences.english: Feng Gang is a natural county with many places of interest .
sentences.chinese: 鳳岡是一個自然環境優美的地方。
